description: tan with red, off-white, and black uneven net-like fiber border; grey rectangular paper stitched in center with crosshatched flowering wave, or mountain-like shapes; large oval in lower center of paper covered with multi-directional tan stitching; tan and black fibers stitched in wavy lines across paper and fiber border to form continuous lines; one circular cutout of paper with black and gray design near URC of paper; four small circular cutouts of paper with colorful dots attached near URC of paper
medium: Cotton and poly wrap, pen and ink, and collage on paper
signed: in black ink, LRC: Norma Minkowitz
title: Lunar Landing
